name: Supergun Arena
description:
Supergun Arena is a simple 1v1 fighting mini game that has a cool AI implemented. I personnaly had a lot of fun playing with my brother and cousins for hours ^^ The goal is like in Super Smash Bros Brawl : Push the enemy into the void to kill him. There is no limit !

Also, there is a cool map manager and editor integrated within the games, and all resolutions of screen are supported.
